thread.section_title: Get Transfer Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Get Transfer | gettransfer.com
thread.title: Henry

author: Henry
title: Henry
text:
They arranged for me good, helpful and friendly driver to pick me up at the airport with a sign at the arrival hall to go to Sapa. I had wonderful experience on the way there. The driver seemed to me an experienced tourguide as well. He introduced to me every historical places or things on the way. He even stop the car at several places for me to take pictures of the countryside sight when I requested him. I strongly recommend this service ! I will surely use their services again during the time I stay in Vietnam.
Henry
